revised_title: Improvements in Glass Condenser and Air-Pump Design
tldr: The author describes a new design for a glass condenser and air-pump, which can be used for various chemical experiments. The condenser and air-pump are made entirely of glass, making them more suitable for precise experiments and easier to clean. The author also explains the process of creating the flat joints, which allow for better sealing and easier disassembly. This innovation could improve the accuracy and efficiency of chemical research.
